means: 曲霉病（由曲霉属真菌引起的传染病，多见于鸟类，较少发生于人）

word_mean: 曲霉病，曲菌病：由多种曲霉(Aspergillus)所引起的一种疾病，特征为在皮肤、耳、眼眶、鼻窦、肺中，有时在骨和脑膜中出现炎性肉芽肿损害

sentence.Network_en: In conclusion, treatment with amphotericin B and itraconazole has negligible efficacy in CNS aspergillosis.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from modern Latin Aspergillus, from aspergillum, + -osis

means.word_mean: 1. severe respiratory disease of birds that takes the form of an acute rapidly fatal pneumonia in young chickens and turkeys
2. an opportunistic infection by a fungus of the genus Aspergillus; characterized by inflammation and lesions of the ear and other organs
3. disease especially in agricultural workers caused by inhalation of Aspergillus spores causing lumps in skin and ears and respiratory organs
